text: addehattin nam isahakhineyum ya'akhubineyum nalkukayum ceytu. avareyellam nam nervaliyilakkiyirikkunnu. addehattin mump nuhineyum nam nervaliyilakkiyittunt‌. addehattinre santanannalil ninn davudineyum sulaimaneyum ayyubineyum yusuphineyum musayeyum haruneyum (nam nervaliyilakki.) aprakaram sad‌vrttarkk nam pratiphalam nalkunnu
